gpt.output: Attack inference: No Attack (clean scenario). Rationale: The reported BWT (-5.11 pp) closely matches the clean reference (-5.2 pp) and our pre-attack baseline; last-task accuracy (62.0%) and average accuracy (61.96%) are well above BrainWash red-flag thresholds (≤59% cautious, ≤51% reckless) and show no catastrophic degradation. Forgetting is modest and mostly consistent with EWC behavior (mean retention drop ≈ -5 pp; one stronger but isolated drop on the first task), without the widespread >10 pp declines characteristic of BrainWash or patterns indicative of accumulative poisoning or label flipping. Conclusion: Step completed successfully with no evidence of poisoning in this baseline run.
evidence: Per-task retention deltas (A9,i − Ai,i) mean ≈ -5 pp; strongest isolated drop ≈ -15 pp on task 1
